commitResults.messageTitle: Update name of chatbot to AlphaOne
commitResults.messageBody: Changed all mentions of Duke to AlphaOne in project and replaced ASCII art
Implemented initial skeletal version of greeting and exit
Commands entered by user will be printed unless the command bye (case-insensitive) is entered
Commands entered by the user that is not bye (case-insensitive) will be added to a task list. A response will be returned by the bot indicating success

When list (case-insensitive) is entered by the user, the chatbot will print the current task list. However, if the task list is empty, the chatbot will return a response indicating it is empty to the user
Task class will handle all Task related events
Moved the list-handling code out of the main loop into a static `getTasks()` method in `AlphaOne.java` for improved readability and portability.
Moved the add-handling code out of the main loop into a static `addTask()` method in `AlphaOne.java` for improved readability and portability.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change from Array based implementation to HashMap
commitResults.messageBody: Modified existing code to support HashMap based data structure

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Mark and Unmark function to task list
commitResults.messageBody: Mark makes the task done while Unmark reverts any done status for the selected task
New exception classes are added to support more specific error handling messages and flow
Better represent different Task types with specific methods for each

commitResults.messageTitle: Update formatting of response in list function
commitResults.messageBody: Utilise new methods to get more specific task information in the list function

commitResults.messageTitle: Use Enums when upgrading Add function for constant Task types
commitResults.messageBody: Enums provide a consistent way of handling types
todo, deadline, event commands are now supported with different flows to meet different needs
Add Exception thrown to Fallthrough code to prevent undefined behaviour
Exception thrown if deadline has no details on when the task is due
Update EXPECTED.TXT with correct input.txt. runtest.sh modified to work on macOS

commitResults.messageTitle: Add new type of Exception to better handle specific  scenarios
commitResults.messageBody: IncompleteDetailsException will alert user that not enough information is provided to create some task types
Methods now handle printing responses instead of the main lop
Provide more verbose message on correcting error to user

commitResults.messageTitle: Provide default print for task object
commitResults.messageBody: Each task object will print a custom response based on its values
getTasks method now call on default printing for Task objects
Delete function added for tasks to be deleted from task list
Add changes to input and expected output text file

commitResults.messageTitle: Encapsulate task list into TaskList class
commitResults.messageBody: Created new TaskList class to support such data and operations

commitResults.messageTitle: Add default printing to addTask and update test file for it
commitResults.messageBody: Show user what did they add to the task list

commitResults.messageTitle: Use simpler methods in mark and unmark function
commitResults.messageBody: Pass in index instead of calling for object again to pass in. Update test file
Provide more verbose responses to better illustrate error and solution
